course_description: This course explores the global currency markets and how companies use analytical strategies to manage their FX exposure across different market conditions.  Students will also learn about the commodity futures markets and explore the energy markets, including short-term trading strategies, long-term investments and financing, and emerging products such as carbon emissions credits.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the MAF program.
sections: Class Nbr: 1320, Section #: 4201, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 11:30a-12:45p, Instructor: S. Ahn, Status: Open
